header.title: Painting
header.subtitle: Jerzy Zborowski
bio.intro: Artist painter, born in 1957, died in 2020. He was a member of the Association of Polish Artists. Individual exhibition of drawings and paintings at the EMPiK Club in Częstochowa in 1987.
bio.exhibitions.1: III Exhibition of the Częstochowa Artists Community, Municipal Art Gallery in Częstochowa, 1998.
bio.exhibitions.2: III Autumn Art Salon, Bureau of Artistic Exhibitions in Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski, 1998.
bio.exhibitions.3: XXIV National Painting Plein Air "Jurajska Jesień", Municipal Art Gallery in Częstochowa, 1999.
bio.exhibitions.4: XXV National Painting Plein Air "Jurajska Jesień", Municipal Art Gallery in Częstochowa, Bureau of Artistic Exhibitions in Nowy Sącz, Friedrichshafen, 2000.
bio.exhibitions.5: Exhibition Artists of Częstochowa XX century, Częstochowa, 2000.
bio.exhibitions.6: Environmental Exhibition of the Association of Polish Artists, Częstochowa, 2004.
bio.awards.1: National Competition named after J. Grabowski, Bureau of Artistic Exhibitions, Tarnów 1990.
bio.awards.2: "Music in Painting", Bureau of Artistic Exhibitions in Tychy, 1996, honorable mention.
bio.awards.3: Works in the collection of the Opytow family in the USA.
